content: **free easy knitting pattern cute rabbits & easter eggs** easter is just around the corner and what better way to celebrate than with some adorable handmade decorations this easy knitting pattern is perfect for beginners and includes a cute little rabbit and colorful easter eggs each rabbit comes with a different outfit adding variety and charm and their faces are embroidered for a unique handmade touch you can even add a little ruffle inside to create a gentle crinkle sound making them even more fun to play with **finished size** rabbits 14 cm / 5 1/2 in easter eggs 5 5 cm / 2 1/8 in **skill level** beginner **techniques** toe-up cast on / circular cast-on / knit in the round / simple increase and decrease stitches
